body_html: @pronobis Thanks for the bug report. I have fixed the bug internally at Google and in the open source Eigen repository (https://bitbucket.org/eigen/eigen/commits/741b932c41cebff49c4419b7e0ef9910ef1b2907). We will have to wait until a few unrelated issues are resolved in Eigen before pushing the fix to open source TensorFlow. Stay tuned! :-)
